name: groq-speech-to-text-mcp-server
description: Groq Speech To Text MCP Server (whisper-large-v3-turbo)

scripts.build: node -e "require('node:fs').rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true })" && tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const p='dist/index.js';let s=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(!s.startsWith('#!')){s='#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+s;fs.writeFileSync(p,s,'utf8');}fs.chmodSync(p,0o755);"
